page.title: 15The climate of Durris
page.content: In our block the weather varies a lot. In spring we often get a lot of wind and rain and the occasional hot,sunny day.It is now midsummer and the weather is still very changeable.In summer we can get a lot of fine days, even into September.Autumn round here is quite windy,but usually dry. Our winter starts in mid November and doesn't stop until April.We often get heavy snow,particularly in January.It can also be very cold in winter with temperatures as low as -27c,which causes problems.However,every winter is not as bad as that,and sometimes it can be quite mild.Another feature of our climate is fog.This can come at any time of year,but the summer fog or "haar"is strange.It comes over the hills from the sea,about ten miles away,and can be very thick.You never quite know what our weather will do.
